snippet: The league will encourage teams to use the video from the home team’s locker room on their stadium scoreboards, to give fans at games extra value and an insider’s view of the team.
abstract: The league will encourage teams to use the video from the home team’s locker room on their stadium scoreboards, to give fans at games extra value and an insider’s view of the team.

headline.main: N.F.L. to Install Cameras in Locker Rooms for Stadium Viewing
